name: 0PixelSortOctoberOG
description: Applies a pixel sorting effect within a specified mask, with customizable thresholds, sorting direction, and visual adjustments like contrast, saturation, and noise.

threshold_min.description: Minimum pixel intensity for sorting. Pixels below this value are ignored, but this only applies inside the mask.

threshold_max.description: Maximum pixel intensity for sorting. Pixels above this value are ignored, but this only applies inside the mask.

sorting_style.description: Defines the style of sorting: 0 = Sort by Hue, 1 = Sort by Saturation, 2 = Sort by Lightness.

angle.description: Angle to rotate the frame before applying the sorting effect.

contrast.description: Adjusts the contrast of the image. A higher value increases contrast.

saturation.description: Adjusts the saturation of the image. A higher value increases saturation.

resolution.description: Controls the resolution at which sorting is performed. Lower values process faster but reduce quality.

noise_amount.description: Percentage of noise to add to the image. Higher values add more noise.

noise_scale.description: Controls the scale of the noise added to the image.

sorting_direction.description: Defines the direction for sorting: 0 = Vertical, 1 = Horizontal.

opacity.description: Blending factor to control how much of the original image is mixed with the effect. 1.0 = full effect, 0.0 = no effect.
